channel.title: Suggestion: king ability- talk with somone at night, like psychic
channel.description:
I think king is a social role, the prevent from voting ability is just count the king as more votes for end game, and doesnt effect 90% of the game. I think king should be able to talk with people at the night and get claims, that will make him way more interesting.
I also think he should be able to talk with 1 or 2 ppl, for his choice, to make it more interesting.
